an6.35:4.1: “These six things play a part in realization.
an6.35:4.3: The perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering in impermanence, the perception of not-self in suffering, the perception of giving up, the perception of fading away, and the perception of cessation.
an6.35:4.4: These are the six things that play a part in realization.”
